attributes.action: Re-open Newtown Hospital A & E Dept.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newtown(Powys) is situated more than 30 miles from the Royal Shrewsbury Hospital and over 40 miles from Aberwystyth University Hospital. These are our nearest Accident and Emergency Departments. The area is rural and covers a huge area. Government cuts closed our local hospitals one by one, we want to stop people dying while in transit to these distant Emergency departments.Please sign up to this petition and make your vote count.
